content.raw:
Yesterday, rather by accident, I came across [https://community.subtchallenge.com/t/cost-of-modified-robot-configuration/1255/3](https://community.subtchallenge.com/t/cost-of-modified-robot-configuration/1255/3) \(Cost of modified robots\) where I learned:

“““We are not expecting to provide a sensor configuration submission window for Cave Circuit. The focus of feature additions to the SubT Virtual Testbed are expected to be new robot models. Teams are welcome and encouraged to submit robot models through the Virtual Model RFI which closes **March 31**.”””?!
content.html:
Yesterday, rather by accident, I came across https://community.subtchallenge.com/t/cost-of-modified-robot-configuration/1255/3 (Cost of modified robots) where I learned:

“““We are not expecting to provide a sensor configuration submission window for Cave Circuit. The focus of feature additions to the SubT Virtual Testbed are expected to be new robot models. Teams are welcome and encouraged to submit robot models through the Virtual Model RFI which closes March 31.”””?!
